review.body:
he changes look good to me. It's a useful extension for copy_from_upstream when integrating upstream implementations.

Perhaps we could briefly describe in https://gist.github.com/jschanck/c67d37551da2a5f6e06c640816d2c99f the alternatives to (big) patches, such as

Adding shim API (similar to `src/common/pqclean_shims`) to avoid having to patch namespaces, function names and incompatible API.
Offer the patch to upstream, if it is not only for OQS-internal reasons.

pull_request.title: Patch mechanism for copy from upstream
pull_request.body:
Opening this PR for discussion around whether we want a patch mechanism for copy from upstream.

This PR contains a functioning patch mechanism. The documentation is here:
https://gist.github.com/jschanck/c67d37551da2a5f6e06c640816d2c99f

repo.name: liboqs
repo.description: C library for prototyping and experimenting with quantum-resistant cryptography
